title: Are permits required to shoot professional fireworks in New Hanover County?  If so, why was a permit approved to shoot fireworks 11-11:30 on 3/11/17 @ Figure Eight Island?
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/2017/03/are-permits-required-to-shoot-professional-fireworks-in-new-hanover-county-why-are-certain-permits-granted/
